definition: throughout the United States/the whole of America
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

pinyin: Quan2 Mei3 guang3 bo1 gong1 si1

sentences.english: The result: Philly had one of the highest death rates in the country.
sentences.chinese: 結果卻導致費城的死亡率高居全美前列。

sentences.english: The low-salt advocates suggest that all 300 million Americans be subjected to a low-salt diet.
sentences.chinese: 低鹽倡導者們建議全美3億人都加入到低鹽飲食中來。

sentences.english: The Oregon museum of science and industry is one of the nation's leading science museums.
sentences.chinese: 奧勒岡州科技博物館是全美領先的科技館。

sentences.english: Chen was selected from nearly 300 professors in the country.
sentences.chinese: 陳煒教授從全美近300名教授中脫穎而出獲得此獎。

sentences.english: Thee Annin flag company makes most American flags.
sentences.chinese: 安寧國旗公司出產全美大部分的國旗。

sentences.english: From Zion, perfect in beauty, God shines forth.
sentences.chinese: 從全美的錫安中，神已經發光了。

sentences.english: When I was in China on the all-America Ping-Pong team.
sentences.chinese: 我和全美乒乓球隊在中國時。

sentences.english: And they come from cities and towns across the United States.
sentences.chinese: 他們都學過漢語，來自全美各城市和鄉鎮。

sentences.english: She has a few works in her life, but she ever obtained the National Book Award and the Pulitzer Prize.
sentences.chinese: 她的作品不多，但她卻獲得過全美圖書獎和普利策獎。

sentences.english: It has been revealed that diners in the two American cities are the lowest tippers in the country.
sentences.chinese: 數據顯示這兩大城市的食客們是全美給小費最少的。

sentences.english: Not surprisingly, DePaul has one of the most diverse student bodies in the U.S.
sentences.chinese: DePaul擁有全美最綜合的學生也就不足爲奇了。

sentences.english: Therefore, Baoyong recommended the full-beauty naked diamond worth million dollars without hesitation.
sentences.chinese: 所以寶詠毫不猶豫向他推薦了價值百萬的全美裸鑽。
從全美範圍來看，這一數值是72%。

sentences.english: The Annin flag company makes maximum American flags.
sentences.chinese: 安寧國旗公司出產全美大部分的國旗。

sentences.english: Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute ranks 41 in America's Best National Universities.
sentences.chinese: 倫斯勒理工學院在全美大學中排名第41位。

pinyin: Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 te4 qu1
